long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take your coding experience to the next level with the Code Optimizer Assistant, a powerful Chrome extension designed to help you optimize and refine your code with ease.

Whether you're working on complex projects or simple scripts, this extension offers a sleek and modern interface to enhance your productivity and streamline your workflow.

Key Features:

Instant Code Analysis: Automatically analyze and optimize your code for better performance, readability, and maintainability.

Modern and User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a clean, intuitive design with smooth transitions and responsive elements that make your coding experience enjoyable.

Syntax Highlighting: Built-in Prism.js support ensures your code is presented with clear and accurate syntax highlighting for multiple languages.

Copy and Share: Easily copy optimized code snippets with a single click and share them with your team.

Retry Functionality: Not satisfied with the optimization? Simply click "Retry" to get a new, refined version of your code.

Detailed Explanations: Receive concise explanations and notes on each optimization, so you can understand the changes and apply best practices in the future.


Important: To use the Code Optimizer Assistant, you must add your own OpenAI API key in the extension's options page. This ensures secure and customized access to OpenAI's services for code analysis.
